mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.program_id AS "programId.id", a.movice_id AS "moviceId.id", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1", userInfo.nickname AS "user.nickname", cmsProgram.name AS "programId.name", cmsMovie.name AS "movieId.name"
LEFT JOIN user userInfo ON userInfo.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN cms_program cmsProgram ON cmsProgram.id = a.program_id LEFT JOIN cms_movie cmsMovie ON cmsMovie.id = a.movice_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_favorite( id, user_id, program_id, movice_id, status, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, remark1 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{programId.id}, #{moviceId.id}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{remark1} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_favorite SET user_id = #{user.id}, program_id = #{programId.id}, movice_id = #{moviceId.id}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
